title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as an LLM provider for chains, agents and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers fluent builder API and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper written in Go that adds interactive model selection and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection friendly interfaces.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams answers from your local Ollama instance into any channel.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with thread support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and common models for reproducible local deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client and SSE streaming for Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command to summarize or rewrite notes using local models.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable online serving across GPU workers.
